name: compcount-figma-analyzer
description: Ferramenta para an√°lise de componentes Figma vs Design System

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run version:patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run version:minor
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run version:major
